DetailedError.description: Contains error information and an array of more specific errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: Optional array of more specific errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

ErrorResponse.description: Gives details for an error that occurred while handling the request. Note that clients MUST NOT assume that every failed request will produce an object of this schema, or that all of the properties in the response will be non-null, as the error may have prevented this response from being constructed.
ErrorResponse.title: Error Response

DetailedErrorResponse.description: Gives details for an error that occurred while handling the request. Note that clients MUST NOT assume that every failed request will produce an object of this schema, or that all of the properties in the response will be non-null, as the error may have prevented this response from being constructed.
DetailedErrorResponse.title: Detailed Error Response
